body:
Hi Nehal,



Examples posted on [Hydrashare](https://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/index.html) should help you get started. [This](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Image-based_Daylight_Analysis) is an example of an imaged simulation.



Sarith
